content: give me the query around payment history for the last 3 months

```sql
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = ? AND payment_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
```
This query will retrieve the payment date and amount for the last 3 months for the specified customer.  Please provide the customer ID to complete the query.

```sql
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 123 AND payment_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
```

This query will return the payment date and amount for customer ID 123 in the last three months.  Please allow a few moments for the results to be retrieved.
